1_1LfQ8dwqkqkGQNCg1kBevHPxjvTRJTQYBz.body: Hello,I am from China,too.Our domestic Internet is partly banned.You know google,facebook and so on are banned in china.We need a free area to communicate with each other and share news.But http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit is so easy to find(from http://127.0.0.1:43110/1HeLLo4uzjaLetFx6NH3PMwFP3qbRbTf3D/).Lots of new chinese users think it is "our bbs".Some people even don't know it's an international p2p APP.We are now recommending it to more and more people(Chinese).Maybe just Geeks use zeronet abroad,but in China,we need a free web space.So we have a higher rate in using zeronet.The bbs can use big chinese advertisement to guide new Chinese users to our gfw talk.

1_15f49K29bmmEMu3FNtR3cbT3Wb28Hrsf9D.body:
兄弟，欢迎回家http://127.0.0.1:43110/NewGFWTalk.bit
